Package org.hibernate.event.internal

Class OnReplicateVisitor

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.event.internal.AbstractVisitor
org.hibernate.event.internal.ProxyVisitor
org.hibernate.event.internal.ReattachVisitor
org.hibernate.event.internal.OnReplicateVisitor
public class OnReplicateVisitor extends ReattachVisitor
When an entity is passed to replicate(), and there is an existing row, we must inspect all its collections and
  1. associate any uninitialized PersistentCollections with this session
  2. associate any initialized PersistentCollections with this session, using the existing snapshot
  3. execute a collection removal (SQL DELETE) for each null collection property or "new" collection
